Hair clip as a temporary hair accessory: Use it to hold back stray hairs or to keep them out of the face during work or exercise.
Hair clip as a paperweight: Place a small note or a drawing on the clip and use it as a decorative paperweight on your desk.
Hair clip as a jewelry holder: Use the clip to hold and organize small jewelry pieces like earrings or necklaces.
Hair clip as a keychain: Attach a small charm or a key ring to the clip and use it as a personalized keychain.
Hair clip as a craft accessory: Use it as a tool to hold small beads or wire while working on a craft project.
